useCase.name: Reproduce media
useCase.description: It describes the common behavior related to reproducing media.

step.action: The user selects one existing album of the supported streaming contents {SC}.
The user selects one of the available multimedia contents.
step.response: The MM application highlights the selected content.

step.action: The user selects the Reproduce option.
step.response: The MM application instantiates the suitable player for the selected content type {SC}.

The MM application starts to reproduce the streaming content, which will be playing until either the player reach the end of the streaming or the user selects one of the available options ( {CO} ) in the player control.
